Returns whether the player still have chances to guess wrong.

public boolean endOfMap()
Returns true if user player reaches the final room.

getAllKeys

public static java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.Integer,Key> getAllKeys()
Returns all of the keys that exist. Static in order to be accessed by the room class.

Returns the number of chances left to guess wrong.

public Room getCurrentRoom()
GETTER: Returns the current room

getDoor

public Door getDoor(Room selectedRoom)
Returns the Door of that connects the currentRoom with the selectedRoom by getting the weight and pulling the assigned integer door value from the door dictionary.

getFinalRoom

public Room getFinalRoom()
GETTER: Returns the final room

getRandomKey

public static Key getRandomKey()
GETTER: Returns a randomly selected key from the key Dictionary.Used to fill the spots of the remaining keys needed[to make 10] in order to challenge the user.

getRoom

public Room getRoom(java.lang.String roomName)
Returns the room that is in the list of the connecting rooms to the current room. If the roomName is not a corresponding room, returns null. Note: When using getRoom, check if null before assigning it anywhere.

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)

printKeys

public java.lang.String printKeys()
Prints a string representation of the possible keys a player can enter. Only used for the Driver Class.

printRooms

public java.lang.String printRooms()
Prints a string representation of the possible rooms the player can enter. Only used for the Driver class.

setCurrentRoom

public void setCurrentRoom(Room selectedRoom)

setFinalRoom

public void setFinalRoom(Room selectedRoom)

unlockDoor

public void unlockDoor(Room lockedRoom)
Replaces the door poniter to that of door zero to simulate the door being unlocked. After this, the door can be entered however many times and would still be unlocked.

wrongAnswer

public void wrongAnswer()
Decrements the number of chances when the player guesses incorrectly.
